sentences.sentence: His muteness an onomatopoeia of the rising moon.
sentences.translation: 他的无言好比月亮升起时声音。

sentences.sentence: After that display of muteness and passivity, you can only imagine a woman—one with shiny lips—steering the beast.
sentences.translation: 在沉默和顺从之后，你只能想象一位红唇女郎驾驭野兽的场面。

sentences.sentence: Right to muteness includes implied right to muteness and express right to muteness and they form the complete muteness system together.
sentences.translation: 沉默权制度可以分为默示沉默权制度和明示沉默权制度，还可以分为审判沉默权制度和审讯沉默权制度。
